EmailTemplate.name: 201710_EMEAI_Nuture_ComHelo_HAPP_JC.201710_EMEAI_Nuture_ComHelo_HAPP EMAIL1_JC
EmailTemplate.subject: Protect Your Avionics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> ARE YOUR AVIONICS PROTECTED? Downtime Costs You Money. Manage your avionics maintenance costs with the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP). We understand that avionics are a big investment, so Honeywell's extended service program offers full coverage for all Honeywell avionics systems. Avoid the unnecessary stress of downtime with quick service and support from our extensive global network of technicians, product experts and more than 600 authorized service centers. Together we'll make sure you get back in the air- fast!
FIND OUT MORE... <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/helohapp]]>
If you don't have Honeywell avionics, please click <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/NonHONAVNX_ComHelo_HAPP.html]]> here.
